archimate:Principle.name: Delegation
archimate:Principle.documentation: The act of one Identity Owner, the Delegator, authorizing another Identity Owner to act as a Delegate. In the Sovrin Network, Delegation is accomplished by the Delegator issuing a Delegation Credential to the Delegate. Note that Delegation is not Impersonation. Delegation is one of three types of identity control relationships described in Appendix C.
